name: Jabberwocky
description:
"Jabberwocky" is a short game made for the 2015 Public Domain Game Jam. We hope you like it!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to jump
  • V to shoot projectiles
  • Left-click to attack with primary weapon
  • ESC to return to menu

Instructions:

  • Your current node is red.
  • Visited nodes are grayed out (but still accessible).
  • Press up (W) in front of the Tum-Tum Tree to purchase upgrades with coins you've collected.
  • Kill the Jabberwock to win.
